frame.name: Containers
frame.definition: <def-root>This frame covers entities which are prototypically conceived of and created to fulfill the function of containing--i.e. <fen>Container</fen>s that contain objects or substances, the <fen>Contents</fen>. This can be expressed as a complement , and includes potential or intended contents. A <fen>Container</fen> may also have an <fen>Owner</fen>, a current <fen>Relative_location</fen>, <fen>Material</fen> from which it is constructed, a method of <fen>Construction</fen>, and a <fen>Type</fen>. Note the connection between words in this frame and those in the Filling, Emptying, and Fullness frames. <ex>a <fex name="Container"><t>bag</t></fex> <fex name="Contents">of popcorn</fex></ex> <ex><fex name="Contents">underwear</fex> <fex name="Container"><t>drawer</t></fex></ex> <ex><fex name="Owner">Chuck's</fex> <fex name="Container"><t>suitcase</t></fex></ex> <ex><fex name="Container">the <t>suitcase</t></fex> <fex name="Rel_loc">in Chuck's office</fex></ex> <ex><fex name="Mat">straw</fex> <fex name="Container"><t>basket</t></fex></ex> <ex><fex name="Cons">woven</fex> <fex name="Container"><t>basket</t></fex></ex> <ex><fex name="Type">Erlenmeyer</fex> <fex name="Container"><t>flask</t></fex></ex></def-root>

FE.name: Container
FE.definition:
<def-root><fen>Container</fen> is an object which is conventionally used as a container. Target words in this frame are tagged with this frame element.
<ex>John carried a <fex name="Container"><t>bucket</t></fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Contents
FE.definition: <def-root><fen>Contents</fen> is the object(s)/stuff contained in the <fen>Container</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Material
FE.definition:
<def-root><fen>Material</fen> identifies the material of which the <fen>Container</fen> is made.
<ex><fex name="Mat">straw</fex> <fex name="Container"><t>basket</t></fex></ex></def-root>

FE.name: Type
FE.definition:
<def-root><fen>Type</fen> designates the type of <fen>Container</fen>. Often the <fen>Type</fen> labels part of a multi-word or compound word target.
<ex><fex name="Type">Erlenmeyer</fex> <fex name="Container"><t>flask</t></fex></ex> <ex><fex name="Type">TABLE</fex><fex name="Container">SPOON</fex></ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Relative_location
FE.definition:
<def-root><fen>Relative_location</fen> is the location of the <fen>Container</fen>.
<ex>The <fex name="Container"><t>wallet</t></fex> <fex name="Rel_loc">in his pocket</fex> was full of photos of his family.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Construction
FE.definition:
<def-root><fen>Construction</fen> indicates the action (or causer) which creates the Container.
<ex><fex name="Cons">fired</fex> <fex name="Container"><t>urns</t></fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Owner
FE.definition:
<def-root><fen>Owner</fen> identifies the owner of the <fen>Container</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Owner">Chuck's</fex> <fex name="Container"><t>suitcase</t></fex></ex></def-root>

FE.name: Use
FE.definition: <def-root><fen>Use</fen> identifies the purpose for which an artifact is constructed and the activity with which it is associated, or the <fen>Contents</fen> protypically contained in the <fen>Container</fen>. <ex><fex name="Use">watering</fex> <fex name="Container"><t>can</t></fex></ex> <ex><fex name="Use">wine</fex> <fex name="Container"> <t>glass</t></fex></ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Part
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE identifies a <fen>Part</fen> of the <fen>Container</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Part">screw top</fex> <fex name="Container"><t>bottle</t></fex></ex></def-root>

FE.name: Descriptor
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Descriptor</fen> describes some aspect of the <fen>Container</fen>.
<ex>He put everything into a <fex name="Descriptor">really really huge</fex> <t>briefcase</t></ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: amfoor.n
lexUnit.definition: met twee oren zoals bij de oude Grieken en Romeinen in gebruik

lexUnit.name: koffer.n
lexUnit.definition: met een scharnierend deksel, waarin je spullen meeneemt als je op reis gaat

lexUnit.name: kwispedoor.n
lexUnit.definition: om in te spugen, o.a. gebruikt door mannen die tabak pruimen

lexUnit.name: vaas.n
lexUnit.definition: waarin je bijvoorbeeld bloemen kunt zetten

lexUnit.name: pipet.n
lexUnit.definition: waarmee je vloeistof opzuigt of afweegt
